Function Documentation

void cherk ( char  uplo,
char  trans,
int  n,
int  k,
real  alpha,
complex *  a,
int  lda,
real  beta,
complex *  c,
int  ldc 
)

cherk performs one of the Hermitian rank k operations for single precision complex numbers:

C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C or C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.

alpha and beta are scalars with both alpha and beta real numbers. A is an n by k matrix in the first case and k by n matrix in the second case. C is an n by n Hermitian matrix.

Parameters:
[in]uplospecifies whether upper or lower traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.
[in]transspecifies operation to be performed.
trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C.
trans = 'C' or 'c', C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.
[in]nspecifies the number of rows/columns of C.
[in]kspecifies the number of colums of A if trans = 'N' or 'n' or the number of rows of A if trans = 'C' or 'c'.
[in]alphamultiplication factor on matrix product.
[in]apointer to matrix A.
[in]ldafirst dimension of A.
[in]betamultiplication factor on C.
[in,out]cpointer to matrix C.
[in]ldcfirst dimension of C.
void cherkSC ( char  uplo,
char  trans,
int  n,
int  k,
real  alpha,
complex *  a,
int  lda,
real  beta,
complex *  c,
int  ldc

zherk performs one of the Hermitian rank k operations for double precision complex numbers:

C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C or C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.

alpha and beta are scalars with both alpha and beta real. A is an n by k matrix in the first case and k by n matrix in the second case. C is an n by n Hermitian matrix.

uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.
[in]transspecifies operation to be performed.
trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C.
trans = 'C' or 'c', C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.
[in]nspecifies the number of rows/columns of C.
[in]kspecifies the number of colums of A if trans = 'N' or 'n' or the number of rows of A if trans = 'C' or 'c'.
[in]alphamultiplication factor on matrix product.
[in]apointer to matrix A.
[in]ldafirst dimension of A.

[in,out]cpointer to matrix C.
[in]ldcfirst dimension of C.

zherk performs one of the Hermitian rank k operations for double precision complex numbers:

C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C or C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.

uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.

trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*conjg( A' ) + beta*C.
trans = 'C' or 'c', C := alpha*conjg( A' )*A + beta*C.
